评论详情: This sweatshirt is awful quality. It sheds like crazy on the inside, awkward neck shape, cheap materials. Boxy fit. Color faded after one wash on delicate and cold. Maybe for a $15 sweatshirt. Not $39.

This is such a comfortable sweatshirt. I love the way it fits and it's nice and soft and warm. The color is also so nice (brown).

评论概述: Decent sweatshirt, but the sleeves are short.
评论详情: The quality of this sweatshirt is good; it's thick and soft. However, the sleeves are short and don't reach to my hands like they do on the model. When I'm standing, the cuffs barely fall to the bend of my wrists, and whenever I raise my arms, they get stuck about three inches higher up on my arms. I'm only 5'3, and my arms aren't disproportionately long!

This sweat shirt arrived today and I'm very pleased with it and the color is exactly as pictured. I laundered it and there was absolutely no shrinkage. I dried it on a casual light setting. It measured 26" at neck to the bottom of hem before laundering and measured 26" when it came out of dryer. No shrinkage. I will buy a couple more. I definitely recommend.  Update 11/22/24: I've purchased a second of these sweat shirts in the cream/vanilla color. I love them sooooo much. I'm going to order the pale pink one and probably another color.

This sweatshirt is comfortable and oversized.  This is Not a thick sweatshirt. It is made thin. You will have to put a thermal shirt on underneath to keep warm.  They do not make sweatshirts thick anymore. I bought them thinking they would be warm but they are not. I do a lot of flying between Texas and Germany they do not keep you warm on the plane.Germany is always so much colder than Texas so I have to try and find a happy medium as far as warmth. Luckily I packed a thermal shirt in my carry on. Plus I packed a sweater.  If you are looking for something warm this is Not it unless you layer it.  Otherwise, I love it. Just an FYI the brown pants and brown top do not match even though they both say brown. The pants are more of a coffee color so I would order the coffee top sweat shirt. I still love them. I believe I could go down a size I ordered an XL.  I believe I should have ordered a large. The top is so large it’s not up against your arms to keep you warm and it’s hard to get a sweater or jacket over the sweat shirt  because it’s so big.  My size is normally a 14-16. I am thinking of ordering a large next time. I own three XL. As long as you have a thermal shirt underneath you shouldn’t need a sweater but I stay cold. I was really hoping these would be thick.

I absolutely love my Blue Comfy Sweatshirt! The fabric is incredibly soft and lightweight but still keeps me warm on chilly days. Highly recommend it to anyone looking for something cozy yet versatile.

The sweater was a good size and the right color, but when I got it there was a weird smell all over it and some black fuzzy stuff I had to pick off. I tossed it in the wash and the smell was gone, but I still do think it was something that was not normal.

I was looking for a pullover that is comfy but also cute and can be worn out of the house. I am weary of shopping Amazon for clothing because it’s usually a bit of a roulette game… well I’m here to tell you that this sweatshirt is my favorite! I’m ordering more. It is perfectly oversized. I ordered my normal size which is XL (I’m 195 lbs and 5’6”). It is nice and soft, has been washed enough times and hasn’t pilled at all. It’s a perfect thickness, don’t worry about it being thin or lightweight. It’s thick and warm! The color was also true. I am very pleased. I’ve even gotten compliments on the fit. It doesn’t hang below my butt (I hate that), but is still baggy and perfectly tight on the bottom. The only thing I can say could be annoying is that if you have extremely long arms like me, the sleeves aren’t that extra long oversized fit. They hit right at my wrists. Overall though I don’t care because everything else about this sweatshirt is perfect!

Don’t hesitate. Just buy this sweatshirt!  I got it on PrimeDay for $26, but even at its regular price, it is well worth it!  The quality is top notch. Super cozy.  I spent a long time reading reviews to figure out what size to order, and I nailed it!  So, to save you all some time:  This is an “oversized sweatshirt” just as it says in the title.  I like my sweatshirts slightly roomy but not oversized down to my knees like the teeny-boppers are wearing these days.  I am 5’6” and weigh 130. I have a 34C chest and normally wear  size  4 or 6 pants and  small-medium shirts.  I would order a medium in a normal sweatshirt.  So for this sweatshirt, I ordered a small and it was still roomy and oversized. It is perfect.  Now, if you want the REALLY over-sized look that so many teenagers are wearing (you know, with shorts you can’t even see), then order your regular size :)

I absolutely love the ANRABESS Women Oversized Sweatshirt! It is incredibly cozy and perfect for cool summer evenings. The fleece material is soft and warm, making it ideal for when the temperature drops a bit. The oversized fit is comfortable and stylish, giving a trendy, laid-back look.  The crewneck pullover design is versatile and pairs well with jeans, leggings, or even shorts. I also appreciate the quality of the fabric and stitching, which feels durable and well-made. This sweatshirt has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe, and I get compliments every time I wear it.  Highly recommend this to anyone looking for a comfortable and fashionable sweatshirt!
